column6: A ghost story in the tradition of CREEPY and EERIE, this standalone issue is set in a World War II concentration camp and stars a feral character who looks like Wolverine, acts like Wolverine...but who is he really? The head Nazi running the camp is about to find out...or he'll die trying.
column8: | penciller (cover):Kaare Andrews | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Mark Millar | colorist:Jose Villarrubia
